title: New paper accepted at ICML 2024
description: Our work on neural architecture search has been accepted for presentation at the International Conference on Machine Learning.

title: Teaching Award Recognition
description: Received the Outstanding Teaching Award for the Hands-On Deep Learning course.

title: Keynote Speaker at AI Conference
description: Invited to give a keynote talk on the future of deep learning at the annual AI Research Symposium.

title: New Research Grant Awarded
description: Secured funding for a 3-year research project on federated learning and privacy-preserving machine learning.
